item.description:
Playing games like Dominoes, Rummikub and other tile based games (like Mahjong) have a nice tactile feel to them.   With the right group of people these classics can be enjoyable and exciting.

To help get the right group of people, this event is cross-posted to the Boston Cards and Conversation group.  So let's show them a warm welcome to being up north.

Furthermore, we will be playing for a slight cause.  At the Gulu this day, they will be exhibiting art work from the YMCA's child care program.  You can purchase this artwork to help fund the program.

Sweet games, sweet kids and a sweet cafe lunch will mark this afternoon.  Come join us! :-)

 

----------------------------

This is a Mini-Meetup. Please be respectful of others who may want to RSVP and allow new or previously inactive members get a slot if they want.  Thanks. See this discussion for more details.

----------------------------

 

Food theme: 

No food theme today because this event will be at a public cafe.

 

About the location: 
This event will be hosted at the Gulu Gulu Cafe in Salem, convieniently located in downtown and a short walk from the T.  For more information see http://www.gulu-gulu.com/index.asp
item.why: classics for a cause is fun!

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Mini-Meetup: Dominoes, Rummikub, Other Tiles
